short_summary: Standing Offer for Cybersecurity Program Support
full_summary:
#### Announcement
**Standing Offer for Cybersecurity Program Support (RSO 22-23-01)**

**Publishing Date**: Tuesday, January 31, 2023
**Closing Date and Time**: Friday, February 24, 2023, 5:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
**Amendment Date**: Tuesday, February 13, 2023

## Purpose
The National Arts Centre (NAC) is seeking Cybersecurity Service Providers to be included in a Standing Offer for a duration of two years. The Standing Offer is to provide NAC with access to experienced experts in the private sector to deliver cybersecurity best practices, upskilling advice, and guidance to shape its cybersecurity program.

## Duration
The Standing Offer is scheduled to commence on April 1, 2023, and shall remain in effect until March 31, 2025.

## Solicitation Details

* **G-Code:** AJ212528, JX7025AD, N7030645, R019P
* **Field of Service:** Computer Systems Security (R&D), Security Devices, Encryption, etc. - Maintenance,  Computer Software - Security, Privacy, Encryption, Audit Controls/AIDS, Threat and Risk Assessment Services
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** National Arts Centre
* **End-User Entity:** National Arts Centre

## Submission Information

* All interested suppliers shall register online at [https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/](https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/) and create a vendor profile.
* For technical help, please contact [nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca](mailto:nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca) or phone 1- 800-354-8010, ext. 2.

**Note:**
Please consult the website https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/opportunities/61786 for complete tender details, including the complete tender package. Documents obtained from other sources may not be recognized during the bid and award process. Bid submissions and registration are free of charge. 

https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/opportunities/61786 (Tender Details)
https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support (Technical Support)  [nacprocurement@nac-cna
